name: Metal Slug
overview: Metal Slug, originally released on the Neo Geo, is a side-scrolling shoot'em'up. The player(s) takes the role of a soldier (or two) and fights a gigantic army. Every level consists of running forward blasting anything that moves, while collecting power-ups along the way (there's also a wide selection of weaponry in the game). In the end of each level the player goes up against one gigantic boss.
